snippet.title: A Legend of Luca - Early WIP Gameplay Teaser - An HTC Vive Launch Title
snippet.description: A Legend of Luca is a VR FPS Rogue-Lite in a Zelda-Like world that uses screen scrolling where the player explores dungeons of many linked rooms to defeat bosses and gain their weapons. Player movement and camera using Room Scale VR via the HTC Vive. Steam Store: http://store.steampowered.com/app/433600 Official Site: http://legendstudio.com/a-legend-of-luca/
